title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.3 - Granting exemptions or variations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 16.3 - Granting exemptions or variations

State Regulations

The department may upon either the application of any interested person or the department's own initiative, grant an exemption or variation from any requirement of this Part when the department finds that such exemption or variation will not result in an undue danger to life and property from radiation hazards. Notes

16.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
